title: Push Local Changes to Remote
description: Git is a popular version control system that allows developers to track changes in their codebase. One of the key features of Git is the ability to push local changes to a remote repository. This allows multiple developers to collaborate on the same codebase and keep it up to date.

meta.title: Mastering Git: Pushing Local Changes to Remote
meta.description: Discover how to efficiently push your local Git changes to a remote repository and collaborate with your team.
meta.keywords: push, version control, git labs, remote repository, git, collaboration, git playground

verify.name: Verify that the push was successful
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 将本地更改推送到远程
i18n.description: Git是一种流行的版本控制系统，它允许开发者跟踪其代码库中的更改。Git的关键特性之一是能够将本地更改推送到远程仓库。这使得多个开发者能够在同一个代码库上进行协作并使其保持最新状态。

meta.title: 掌握Git：将本地更改推送到远程
meta.description: 探索如何高效地将本地Git更改推送到远程仓库并与团队协作。
meta.keywords: 推送, 版本控制, Git实验室, 远程仓库, Git, 协作, Git游乐场

steps.title: 将本地更改推送到远程

verify.name: 验证推送是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
